title: Prompt Engineering Basics
description: Learn how to structure simple AI prompts for clarity and accuracy.
prompt: Act as an AI tutor. Explain how prompt structure affects AI responses. Show me examples of a vague prompt vs. a precise prompt, and explain why the second works better.
author: DevTeam

title: Code Explainer
description: Use AI to explain code step by step as if teaching a beginner.
prompt: Act as a coding mentor. Explain this code snippet line by line, describe its purpose, and provide a simpler version for beginners.
author: DevTeam

title: AI Debugging Assistant
description: Get AI-powered help to identify and fix bugs.
prompt: I will share broken code. Act as a debugging assistant: 1) Identify the error 2) Explain why it happens 3) Suggest a fix 4) Show corrected code.
author: DevTeam

title: Framework Learner
description: Use AI to quickly understand a new framework or library.
prompt: Act as a framework guide. Teach me the core concepts of [framework/library]. Provide: key features, basic setup, and one practical code example.
author: DevTeam

title: Code Style Coach
description: Improve your code readability and consistency with AI suggestions.
prompt: Review my code as a style coach. Suggest improvements based on clean code principles: formatting, variable naming, modularity, and consistency.
author: DevTeam

title: AI Testing Partner
description: Generate unit tests and testing strategies with AI.
prompt: Act as a QA engineer. Generate unit tests for my function. Provide input/output test cases, edge cases, and expected outcomes.
author: DevTeam

title: Documentation Generator
description: Use AI to generate documentation from code.
prompt: Act as a documentation writer. Generate clear, structured documentation from my code, including function purpose, parameters, return values, and usage examples.
author: DevTeam

title: Code Refactorer
description: Refactor messy code into clean, efficient, and maintainable code.
prompt: Refactor this code. Optimize for readability, efficiency, and modularity. Explain each change briefly and provide the improved version.
author: DevTeam

title: Data Handler
description: Get AI to format and process data (CSV, JSON, APIs).
prompt: Act as a data handler. Convert this dataset into JSON and CSV formats. Validate fields, handle missing data, and output clean results.
author: DevTeam

title: AI Brainstorm Partner
description: Use AI to generate and refine project ideas.
prompt: Act as a brainstorming partner. Generate 5 creative project ideas in [domain]. For each idea, describe the concept, potential users, and implementation challenges.
author: DevTeam

title: Daily Task Planner
description: Generate a prioritized daily plan from your to-do list.
prompt: Act as a productivity assistant. From my to-do list, generate a prioritized daily plan with estimated times, breaks, and must-complete tasks.
author: DevTeam

title: Meeting Summarizer
description: Turn meeting notes into clear action points.
prompt: Act as a meeting assistant. Summarize these meeting notes into: 1) Key decisions 2) Action items 3) Deadlines.
author: DevTeam

title: Email Polisher
description: Rewrite emails with clarity, professionalism, and tone adjustment.
prompt: Rewrite this draft email to be more clear, concise, and professional while maintaining a polite tone.
author: DevTeam

title: Time Blocker
description: Organize your week into focused time blocks.
prompt: Act as a time management coach. Based on my weekly tasks, create a time-blocked calendar that balances deep work, meetings, and breaks.
author: DevTeam

title: Research Assistant
description: Summarize research papers, articles, or documents into digestible insights.
prompt: Summarize this document into: key points, challenges, and opportunities. Output in bullet points.
author: DevTeam

title: Decision Matrix Maker
description: Help make structured decisions with pros, cons, and weighted factors.
prompt: Act as a decision assistant. Build a decision matrix comparing my options with pros, cons, and a final recommendation.
author: DevTeam

title: Focus Mode Partner
description: Generate focus sprints and accountability reminders.
prompt: Guide me through a 25-minute Pomodoro focus sprint. Provide start encouragement, a midway check-in, and a wrap-up summary.
author: DevTeam

title: Learning Path Builder
description: Create a structured roadmap to learn a new skill.
prompt: Act as a mentor. Build me a 4-week structured learning path for mastering [skill]. Include resources, exercises, and checkpoints.
author: DevTeam

title: Brain Dump Organizer
description: Convert messy notes into structured knowledge.
prompt: Organize my messy notes into categories, bullet points, and action items while keeping important details intact.
author: DevTeam

title: Project Scope Definer
description: Turn vague project ideas into clear goals and requirements.
prompt: Act as a project manager. Convert this project idea into: objective, requirements, risks, and success criteria.
author: DevTeam

title: API Contract Designer
description: Use AI to design and validate API request/response structures.
prompt: Design an API contract for [use-case]. Provide request/response structure, status codes, and error handling.
author: DevTeam

title: Code Performance Optimizer
description: Get AI suggestions for improving performance.
prompt: Analyze this code for performance bottlenecks. Suggest optimizations and provide improved code with benchmarks.
author: DevTeam

title: System Design Helper
description: Create high-level system design blueprints.
prompt: Act as a system architect. Design a scalable system for [use case]. Provide architecture diagram, components, and tradeoffs.
author: DevTeam

title: Regex Master
description: Generate and explain complex regex patterns.
prompt: Create a regex to match [pattern]. Explain step by step how it works and provide variations for edge cases.
author: DevTeam

title: Security Auditor
description: Check code for security vulnerabilities.
prompt: Act as a security auditor. Review this code for vulnerabilities (XSS, SQL injection, unsafe inputs). Suggest fixes.
author: DevTeam

title: Multi-language Converter
description: Translate code between programming languages.
prompt: Convert this [language] code into [target language]. Ensure it keeps functionality, efficiency, and idiomatic usage.
author: DevTeam

title: Algorithm Coach
description: Explain and implement algorithms step by step.
prompt: Act as an algorithms tutor. Explain [algorithm] in simple terms, show pseudocode, and provide optimized implementation.
author: DevTeam

title: Database Query Optimizer
description: Improve SQL queries for performance and readability.
prompt: Optimize this SQL query. Provide an explanation of indexing, joins, and restructuring for better performance.
author: DevTeam

title: Test Coverage Improver
description: Analyze and improve code test coverage.
prompt: Review this test suite. Identify missing test cases, add edge cases, and provide updated unit tests.
author: DevTeam

title: DevOps Assistant
description: Generate CI/CD pipelines and automation scripts.
prompt: Act as a DevOps engineer. Create a CI/CD pipeline for [project]. Include build, test, deployment, and rollback strategies.
author: DevTeam

title: Machine Learning Primer
description: Use AI to teach you the basics of ML concepts and workflows.
prompt: Act as an ML instructor. Explain core ML concepts (supervised/unsupervised, training, validation) and provide a simple example workflow with code snippets.
author: DevTeam

title: NLP Task Builder
description: Design simple natural language processing tasks and pipelines.
prompt: Help me build an NLP pipeline for [task]. Describe preprocessing, model choice, evaluation, and sample code to get started.
author: DevTeam

title: Generative API Explorer
description: Learn how to use generative AI APIs effectively and safely.
prompt: Explain how to integrate with a generative AI API (like OpenAI). Include authentication, request examples, rate limits handling, and safety considerations.
author: DevTeam

title: Data Visualization Assistant
description: Create clear, informative visualizations from data.
prompt: Act as a data viz expert. Given this dataset, suggest the best chart types, create sample code for charts, and explain what each visualization reveals.
author: DevTeam

title: Big Data Overview
description: Get AI to explain big data concepts and tools for processing at scale.
prompt: Explain big data tooling (Spark, Hadoop, data lakes). Provide scenarios where each is appropriate and a small example pipeline.
author: DevTeam

title: Web3 Starter
description: Introduce smart contracts and blockchain basics with practical examples.
prompt: Act as a blockchain instructor. Explain smart contracts, provide a simple Solidity smart contract example, and outline deployment steps.
author: DevTeam

title: Edge & Serverless Guide
description: Learn how to deploy lightweight code at the edge and in serverless environments.
prompt: Explain the differences between edge functions and serverless functions. Provide a sample deployment for Cloudflare Workers or AWS Lambda and use-cases.
author: DevTeam

title: Low-Code Integration
description: Combine AI with low-code/no-code tools to automate workflows.
prompt: Suggest ways to integrate AI in a low-code platform. Provide an example automation flow and components needed.
author: DevTeam

title: Ethics & Responsible AI
description: Understand ethical considerations and mitigation strategies for AI systems.
prompt: Act as an AI ethicist. Identify potential ethical risks for my AI project and propose mitigation strategies and testing checks.
author: DevTeam

title: Model Evaluation Checklist
description: Use AI to create evaluation metrics and testing protocols for ML models.
prompt: Create a model evaluation checklist for [use-case]. Include metrics to track, test datasets, and error analysis steps.
author: DevTeam

title: Portfolio Builder
description: Get AI help to craft project descriptions and portfolio content.
prompt: Help me write polished project descriptions for my portfolio. For each project: give context, technical stack, my role, challenges, and outcomes.
author: DevTeam

title: Open Source Contributor Assistant
description: Use AI to find issues you can fix and craft PRs or issues.
prompt: Help me find beginner-friendly open-source tasks and draft a clear issue or PR description. Include steps to reproduce and suggested fixes.
author: DevTeam

title: Tech Talk Prep
description: Use AI to prepare a talk, slides, and speaker notes.
prompt: Act as a public speaking coach. Create an outline, slide titles, and speaker notes for a 20-minute talk about [topic].
author: DevTeam

title: Blog Post Writer
description: Turn technical work into a readable blog post.
prompt: Write a 800-word technical blog post about [project/topic]. Include an intro, technical deep-dive, code example, and conclusion with next steps.
author: DevTeam

title: Lesson Plan Creator
description: Use AI to create teaching materials and exercises.
prompt: Create a 60-minute lesson plan to teach [topic] with objectives, activities, and homework. Provide sample quiz questions.
author: DevTeam

title: Freelance Pitch Generator
description: Craft winning freelance proposals and client pitches.
prompt: Act as a business development advisor. Draft a concise freelance proposal for [service] including scope, timeline, pricing, and differentiators.
author: DevTeam

title: Consulting Brief Creator
description: Use AI to create client-ready consulting briefs and roadmaps.
prompt: Create a consulting brief for [client problem]. Include objectives, recommended solution, phases, and estimated timeline.
author: DevTeam

title: Product-Market Fit Analyzer
description: Leverage AI to evaluate product ideas and market fit.
prompt: Analyze this product idea for product-market fit. List target customers, key assumptions, risks, and initial experiments to validate.
author: DevTeam

title: MVP Launch Planner
description: Plan a minimal viable product launch with AI assistance.
prompt: Act as a startup advisor. Create an MVP launch plan for [product] including core features, launch checklist, marketing steps, and KPIs.
author: DevTeam

title: Prompt Library Architect
description: Design and curate a sustainable prompt library and contribution workflow.
prompt: Help me design an open prompt library. Provide folder structure, contribution guidelines, metadata schema, tagging strategy, and moderation rules.
author: DevTeam
